title: Ki or breathing
creator_credit: Toshio Matsumoto, Arata Isozaki, Teruji Dhibata and Committee For The Year 2001
brief_description: An experimental film that attempts to create through the ‘breathing’ of visuals and music, the rhythm of Ki, the Japanese ideogram that symbolises the energy permeating the whole universe.
creator_credit_for_label: Toshio Matsumoto, Arata Isozaki, Teruji Dhibata and Committee For The Year 2001
description: An experimental film that attempts to create through the ‘breathing’ of visuals and music, the rhythm of Ki, the Japanese ideogram that symbolises the energy permeating the whole universe.
